section.title: Where are we now?
section.p: We are early in the 0.8 stage, the "Usability" stage. We have just released our third beta of 0.8, eventually we will cut a final release of 0.8. After the 0.8 final release, we will continue to rely on your feedback to make enchancements and fixes that help you use OpenEJB. These enchancements will be released as incremental releases, for example 0.8.1 or 0.8.4.
